spec_data.Name: perl-XML-Atom-SimpleFeed
spec_data.Description:
This module provides a minimal API for generating Atom syndication feeds
quickly and easily. It supports all aspects of the Atom format, but it has
no provisions for generating feeds with extension elements.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:21:19 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: No-fuss generation of Atom syndication feeds
